name: GET Request

children.description: When the user wants to evaluate the 2+3 in MathJS
Milo 2.0 executes a GET on the resource /v4/

testSteps.description: Then he should see the 5 in the browser

children.description: When the user wants to evaluate the 2*(7-3) in MathJS
Milo 2.0 executes a GET on the resource /v4/

testSteps.description: Then he should see the 8 in the browser

userStory.narrative:
As a tester
  I want to test the MathJS webservice
  To realize the serenity-resassured-bootstrap
